definition: any living or extinct member of the family Hominidae characterized by superior intelligence, articulate speech, and erect carriage, provide with workers
details:
noun
- any living or extinct member of the family Hominidae characterized by superior intelligence, articulate speech, and erect carriage
= synonyms: human
- all of the living human inhabitants of the earth
= synonyms: world, human race, humanity, humankind, human beings, humans, mankind
- game equipment consisting of an object used in playing certain board games
= synonyms: piece
- an adult human who is male
= example: an adult human who is male
= synonyms: adult male
- a male person who plays a significant role in the life of a particular person, such as a husband or lover or boyfriend
= example: a male person who plays a significant role in the life of a particular person, such as a husband or lover or boyfriend
- an adult male person who has a manly or masculine character
= example: an adult male person who has a manly or masculine character
- the generic use of the word to refer to any human being
= example: the generic use of the word to refer to any human being
- a male subordinate
- someone who serves in the armed forces
= synonyms: military personnel, serviceman, military man
- a manservant who acts as a personal attendant to his employer
= example: a manservant who acts as a personal attendant to his employer
= synonyms: gentleman, valet, gentleman's gentleman
verb
- provide with workers
= example: provide with workers
- take charge of a certain job
